It's hard to nail down my feelings about this game. I was expecting a terror game but got a coop action packed party with even fun jump scares.
Overall yes, I do recommend it! But beware as it might not be everyone's cup of tea.

[u]Probably everyone knows it[/u] but for the record, I'll say it anyway:
The game is as simple as 4 people trying to escape one killer, they do so by powering 5 engines. These 5 engines are randomly distributed in the map. Once these 5 engines are turned on, 2 gates will be powered and you are allowed to leave... if the killer lets you that is. Killer's objective is to hook survivors so they get sacrificed to an Entity. As long as you complete objectives, dying (survivor) or having survivors escape (killer) game will still reward you greatly for your efforts

Game gets boring if it's only that, but as most MOBA-like games, and there are more variations than just a different killer, there are perks and items which can slightly but notably change the game's course.
If you enjoyed games like Payday 2 (which I used to play non stop few years ago), this game shares stunning resemblance with usable items, add-ons, offerings and of course, perks.

Community is overall fun, I played both as survivor and as killer and found toxic behaviors from both sides, but there were [b]more[/b] sportmen moments than those. 

I was hesitant at first to buy it, but after the free week playing with some friends, I really found myself enjoying the game.
If you have some friends too, give it a shot. If you love games like PAYDAY 1 or 2, this might be for you too.

[i]PS: DLC is unnecessary for progression in any way, if you were curious; unless you really wanted a killer/survivor[/i]

我是最早接触一批玩家，不敢玩的一批玩家也是我
被追响起BGM我都快崩溃了
开局遇屠夫这局我不用修发电机了，被追出有阴影了
宁愿躲在柜子里被斩杀也不愿意整局被一个屠夫一直追
挂在架子上也是开始守尸，这让我很恶心，哎....屠夫可真是个人才
为什么是个人才，我被屠夫追的时候或者被守尸，哪怕发电机修好了，屠夫旁边经过我队友，他都不去追的
我感觉上辈子欠他债一样

萌新们求你了，玩个游戏你屠夫贴脸守没收益的，会玩点的你一守机子全开，然后我就是那个被贴脸守的，你觉得这样恶心人好玩吗？本来我觉得守没啥大问题的，我一是被守的那个就难受的呀，队友也不会找一刀杀图腾，低端局真的玩的我好憋屈，再怎么溜屠夫队友还是不给力，我求求你们萌新了，多看多一点杀机视频再来打游戏可以吗，我今天12段低端遇到的全是贴脸守，别守了别守了，带个人肉烧烤去抓人吧
it was worth the money i payed its so much fun when you scare your friends

В этой игре есть все, что есть в реальной жизни: школа которую ты уже с самого начала ненавидишь, дурка, карта с аниме и т.д. На каждой из карт тебя могут встретить: Дядя Валера, почтенный ветеран Вьетнамской войны, шиз с светодиодами в очке, педофил-сталкер который постоянно выпригивает хуй знает откуда и малыш Виктор, является тренажером для отрабатывания лоу кик ударов.
Игра очень прикольная, всем советую.

p.s кемперы не люди

Great game with somehow toxic player base but which game doesnt have it. :D Pretty much anyone can find their own playstyle and character (whether as a killer or a survivor). Not really begginer friendly by my opinion but thanks to ranking system you can play against new ppl as well (still need some luck, cuz sometimes you just get rank 2-3 times better than yours or smurfs) and you can find SO MANY instructional videos and tips with just writing DBD in browser.  So please TRY IT. (We need more ppl ToT)
Its a great game go check it out!

unique gameplay, Game is fun, if you don't take it too seriously. It's "broken" only if you play for results, not for having fun in the process.
To fight boredom you can: play both sides, play different killers (their powers differ a lot), use different builds.
The game is worth it simply because it can be a lot of fun. I've played solo since the game discount. And yes, some matches can be frustrating. But like another user stated. "The game is broken if you play for results."

18年入坑，经历过锁疲劳的平衡改动，但凭自己的苦练单排逃生率大约8成，经过几个大版本的削弱，20年单排逃生率已不到2成；18年玩小叮当，在白段被溜哭，20年玩夹哥，凭1把砍刀在低段位就能杀疯，更别提幻神屠夫。屠夫击倒人类越来越容易，新出屠夫不断增加远程击杀机制，以前的绕板区和绕墙区已经不足以溜会玩的屠夫，虽上分难度增加不少，但相比以前被溜5台，1挂守尸，友好不知道多少，就这还有不少babykiller觉得屠夫太弱
o Jogo È muito bom e esse jogo pode render ums bons sustos
糟糕的匹配机制，屠夫匹配时间长还被高段位虐，BUG多，外挂多，气人游戏，不过开发商还是对中国挺友好的，联动的dlc也很有意思，也还是4v1的鼻祖，该玩还是玩吧

I first picked up this game back when it was first available on steam I think in 2016. The game at first was buggy as hell and things were LITERALLY broken, but still fun. If you really want to get a sense of how far this game has come, go to Youtube and watch the video "DbD Throughout the Years" by OhTofu.
